Package com.twl.xg.service

Class PropertyService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twl.xg.service.PropertyService

  • @Service
public class PropertyService
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods to save and get properties of the application. These properties are stored in database.

    • Method Detail

      • getProperty

        @Transactional
public java.lang.String getProperty​(java.lang.String propertyName)
        Get property value by the input property name. If there is no such property, return null;

      • deleteProperty

        @Transactional
public void deleteProperty​(java.lang.String propertyName)
        Delete the property by the input propertyName. If the input property name is null or doesn't exist, just ignore it.

      • setProperty

        @Transactional
public void setProperty​(java.lang.String propertyName,
                        java.lang.String propertyValue)
        Save or update property by the input name and value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the input property name is null.

      • getPropertyMap

        @Transactional
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getPropertyMap​()
        Get all property from database, return a map view of properties. Users should not modify this map.
        Returns:
        A Map of property name and value pair.
